title: Velocity CLI options
description:
The Velocity CLI options available when velocity.jar is used to run a Minecraft proxy.
https://papermc.io/software/velocity

--add-server <name>:<address>.description: Define a server mapping. You must ensure that server name is not also registered in the config or use -- ignore-config-servers.

--haproxy, --haproxy-protocol <Boolean>.description: Choose whether to enable haproxy protocol. The configuration haproxy protocol will be ignored.

--ignore-config-servers.description: Skip registering servers from the config file. Useful in dynamic setups or with the --add-server flag.

-p, --port <Integer>.description: Specify the bind port to be used. The configuration bind port will be ignored.
